sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2019 Solstice of Heroes event.

displayProperties.description: Defeat enemies in strike playlists using a subclass that matches the [Arc] / [Solar] / [Void] Day, loot chests in the European Aerial Zone, and defeat Fallen using a subclass that matches the [Arc] / [Solar] / [Void] Day.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Plate (Renewed)
